1.title: Fry This!

episode of.title: The Best Thing I Ever Made (TV Series 2011– )

4.title: Hauntingly Good

episode of.title: The Best Thing I Ever Made (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Sunny Anderson, Jacques Torres, Susan Feniger and Eric Greenspan share their favorite recipes for Halloween, including a ghostly scene constructed out of chocolate; curry-favored caramel corn; pancakes made with candy; and moon pies.

episode of.title: The Best Thing I Ever Made (TV Series 2011– )
